short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, tag, search, and copy code snippets from the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Code Snippet Saver is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed for developers, programmers, and coding enthusiasts. It allows you to effortlessly capture, organize, and retrieve code snippets from any webpage, turning your browser into a personalized code library.
Key Features:

Easy Snippet Capture: Simply select any code on a webpage, right-click, and choose "Save Code Snippet" to instantly save it to your library.
Organized Storage: All your snippets are neatly organized with details like the source URL and date of capture, making it easy to track the origin of each piece of code.
Tagging System: Add custom tags to your snippets for effortless categorization and quick retrieval. Organize your snippets by language, project, or any system that works for you.
Powerful Search: Quickly find the snippet you need with our robust search functionality. Search through your snippets' content or tags to locate exactly what you're looking for.
One-Click Copy: Copy any snippet to your clipboard with just one click, ready to be pasted into your project.
Snippet Management: Easily remove outdated or unnecessary snippets to keep your library clean and relevant.
Sync Across Devices: Your snippets are synced across all your Chrome browsers, ensuring your code library is always at your fingertips, no matter which device you're using.
Privacy-Focused: All your snippets are stored locally in your browser. We don't collect or store any of your data on external servers.

Perfect for:

Developers who frequently reference code examples
Students learning new programming languages
Tech writers creating coding tutorials
Anyone who wants to build a personal library of useful code snippets

Save time, stay organized, and boost your productivity with Code Snippet Saver. Never lose a useful piece of code again!
